community_4.location: 北京市大兴区天河西路2号院
community_4.en_location: No. 2 Court, Tianhe West Road, Daxing District, Beijing
community_4.description: wankecheng stands as a testament to modern living in the heart of Beijing's peaceful suburbs. Constructed with the latest eco-friendly materials, this community prioritizes sustainability while ensuring comfort and luxury. The tall silver pine trees, from which the community gets its name, dot the skyline and provide refreshing shade during the summer months. Residents can benefit from the meticulously landscaped gardens, which are interspersed with cozy seating areas and beautiful water features. The community center offers various activities, fostering a sense of camaraderie among neighbors. Despite its secluded location, Silver Pine Heights remains connected to the city through efficient transport networks, making daily commutes and weekend getaways equally convenient.
community_4.nearby_info: This commnunity is surrounded by: The subway includes Huangcun Railway Station and Huangcun West Street; supermarkets include vegetable supermarkets and Wumart Supermarket (Daxing Huangcun store); shopping malls include Daxing Dayue Chunfengli and Daxing Star City Commercial Building; hospitals include Xingzheng Town, Daxing District, Beijing Dongli Community Health Service Station, Jingnan Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Daxing District, Beijing; Parks include Street Center Park; Schools include Beijing Daxing District No. 1 Middle School, Beijing Daxing District No. 8 Primary School; restaurants include Bantian Yao Green Pepper Grilled Fish (Daxing Hotel Store), Jingmen Laobao San (Guanyin Temple Store); banks include Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Beijing Daxing Branch), Industrial and Commercial Bank of China ATM (Beijing Daxing Branch).

community_5.location: 北京市大兴区三合北巷2、4号院
community_5.en_location: No. 2 and 4 Court, Sanhe North Lane, Daxing District, Beijing
community_5.description: sanhejiayuan is a contemporary community nestled in the tranquil outskirts of Beijing. This newly erected haven offers an escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Enveloped by lush greenery and picturesque landscapes, residents can enjoy serene morning walks alongside babbling brooks and well-maintained pathways. Each building showcases modern architectural design with spacious balconies that provide panoramic views of the surrounding hills.
community_5.nearby_info: This commnunity is surrounded by: The subway includes Huangcun West Street; supermarkets include Sanhe Nanli Convenience Mall and Xiqingde Department Store; shopping malls include Bailian Qingcheng International Shopping Center and Jixing Deyi Life Plaza; hospitals include Daxing District Town Yonghua Beili Community Health Service Station; parks include Xingwang Park (South District); schools include the Experimental School Affiliated to the National Institute of Educational Administration, Daxing District No. 2 Primary School; restaurants include Tibetan Style Restaurant (Daxing Branch), Huangni Roast Pigeon (Huangcun Branch); banks include Tianjin Bank (Beijing Daxing Branch), Tianjin Bank 24-hour self-service banking (Daxing Branch).
